subject: Call For Papers
from: SDIWC - The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications <do_not_reply@dcmrf.net>
body:
Dear Colleague:

Please consider contributing to one of the following conferences. The URL for all of them is

www.sdiwc.net
*************


The International Conference on Informatics and Applications (ICIA2012)
Place: Malaysia
Dates: June 3-5, 2012


The International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Warfare and Digital Forensic (CyberSec2012)- Technical Co-sponsored by IEEE
Place: Malaysia
Dates: June 26-28, 2012


The Second International Conference on Digital Information Processing and Communications (ICDIPC2012)- Technical Co-sponsored by IEEE
Place: Lithuania
Dates: July 10-12, 2012


The Second International Conference on Digital Enterprise and Information Systems (DEIS2012)
Place: Czech Republic
Dates: July 16-18, 2012


The World Congress on E-Commerce and Business on the Web (WCEBW2012) - Technical Co-sponsored by IEEE
Place: United Kingdom
Dates: Aug. 27-29, 2012


The International Conference on E-Learning and E-Technologies in Education (ICEEE2012) - Technical Co-sponsored by IEEE
Place: Poland
Dates: Sept. 24-26, 2012

The International Conference on Computing, Networking and Digital Technologies (ICCNDT 2012)
Place: Bahrain
Dates: Nov. 11-13, 2012


----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5
